thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: Simon Bush
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Simon Bush

author: Simon Bush
title: Simon Bush
text:
Hi,
Having endured the unnecessary confusion of multiple fee charges on many rental car websites I ended up booking
our hire car through a broking site (Rentalcars.com) because there appeared to transparency in the fee structure.
Unfortunately this was not the case, and I will provide separate feedback to Rentalcars.com.
I am supplying Redspot with feedback because I want to thank Jason for his service on 17th March when we picked up the car.
Despite my confusion & disappointment at what I experienced with Rentalcars.com he was very patient & helpful in sorting things out.
Based on Jasonâ€™s service I will choose Redspot again for future hire car services.
Regards
Simon Bush
PS: As I pointed out when returning the car on Saturday 25th March the signage (or lack of) is terrible.
With roadworks happening at the entry to the Redspot portion of the carpark it was very confusing finding the correct entry.
It is shameful that Perth airport charged me $6 because initially I entered the wrong part of the carpark & had to exit and re-try.
PPS: being asked to do this trustpilot review after already submitting the above on Sunday 26th March is a little frustrating
